trans-unit.source: Animates from the <xref:System.Int16> value of the previous key frame to its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value*> using discrete interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 從<xref:System.Int16>到其自有的上一個主要畫面格的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value*>使用離散插補。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value*> </xref:System.Int16>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16AnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Int16> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用做為一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrameCollection>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16AnimationUsingKeyFrames>以動畫方式顯示<xref:System.Int16>沿著一組主要畫面格的屬性值。</xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16AnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16AnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格定義的區段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16AnimationUsingKeyFrames>其所屬。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16AnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每個主要畫面格具有目標<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的時間主要畫面格之<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value%2A>應該達到。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int16KeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格以動畫顯示從上一個主要畫面格的目標值至它自己的目標值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 先前的主要畫面格結束，並在達到它自己的索引鍵時間時結束時啟動它。

trans-unit.source: Discrete key frames like DiscreteInt16KeyFrame create sudden "jumps" between values (no interpolation).
trans-unit.target: 特定的主要畫面格，例如 DiscreteInt16KeyFrame 建立突然"跳躍點 」 值 （沒有插補） 之間。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the animated property does not change until the key frame's key time is reached, at which point the animated property goes suddenly to the target value.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，動畫的屬性之前不會變更主要畫面格的索引鍵時間為止，此時動畫的屬性會突然跳到目標值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref>類別指定的結束值。

trans-unit.source: The ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格結束值 （也稱為 「 目標值 」）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref>類別使用指定結束值和 key time。

trans-unit.source: The ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格結束值 （也稱為 「 目標值 」）。

trans-unit.source: The key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格的 key time。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached, which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: Key time 決定何時到達目標值，這也是主要畫面的結束。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt16KeyFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Uses discrete interpolation to transition between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame.
trans-unit.target: 使用離散插補在先前的主要畫面格值與目前的主要畫面格的值之間的轉換。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立動畫的來源值。

trans-unit.source: A value from 0.0 through 1.0 that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 從 0.0 到 1.0，指定這個主要畫面格經過時間的百分比值。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 這個主要畫面格的輸出值會指定指定基底值和進度。
